title: Intro
content: Space Station here! Please watch this introductory broadcast!

title: Welcome
content:
Welcome back to Digidamara - who will YOU choose to birth the new universe?!
Your final 6 teams need energy to keep dancing! 
The team with the lowest energy at the end of each day will be eliminated!

title: How to Play
content:
Thank you for joining us Spectators.
You can donate energy to teams using your action points.
Every time you spend an action point, you gain a spark.
Sparks can be used in our voting booth. For more instructions go to the Help section.

title: Vote Now!
content:
How are you doing you wonderful beings?
Supporting your favourite team until the end?
Don't forget to vote! We can't build the new universe without you!

title: Goodnight
content:
What an amazing day of competition! Their life and death are in your hands!
So dance until your side hurts, say I love you to those you love. For tomorrow may never come
at least not in the way you expect it. Goodnight.

title: Entering Rest Mode
content:
Thank you Spectators for your input.
Systems sleep. 
Signal returns \\ 12pm Atlantic Space Time.

title: New Day
content:
Tune in, tune on, tune out, tune off and explode - it's DIGIDAMARA!!! 
If not 100% satisfied - go get another version of satisfaction! 
Let's see where our contestants are today

title: System Reactivated
content:
Welcome Spectators
Eliminated team: the Eeksums, Babes and Bass!
Top team: Grunter!
Vote Outcome: Ideal of Affection!

title: Sad to see them go
content:
Sad to see them go, 50 bajillion clickhours danced!
You voted for that Ideal eh? Oh you darlings!
Remember to tune in to see how this choice plays out in today's Round Up at 3pm Atlantic Space time!

title: Reminder
content:
Join a team fanclub to gain the ability to upgrade.
Upgrading a team gives you more sparks when you donate energy to that team.

title: Round Up Imminent
content:
Tune in soon for our first Round Up of the action!
Remember you can stay up to date on all the wizbang hootenanny in the Video section

title: Reminder
content:
Competing for the biggest prize ever known - the universe!
Don't they deserve your support? Get those actions out there and those sparks a'poppin!

title: Goodnight
content:
Well folks that's another day of competition wrapped up in a nice bow.
Our transmission is breaking up as we swing behind the liquid darkness field of our partner moon
See you on the other side

title: Entering Rest Mode
content:
Thank you Spectators for your input.
Systems sleep. 
Signal returns \\ 12pm Atlantic Space Time.

title: Story Unlocked!
content: Alert: New data files unlocked for all surviving teams!
